title: (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021), in so far as it is not already in operation,
heading: 1. This order may be cited as the Health (Amendment) Act 2021
text_raw:
1. This order may be cited as the Health (Amendment) Act 2021 

(Commencement) (No. 3) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) (no 3) order 2021

title: (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021), in so far as it is not already in operation,
heading: 2. The 26th day of March 2021 is appointed as the day on which the Health
text_raw:
2. The 26th day of March 2021 is appointed as the day on which the Health 
(Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021), in so far as it is not already in operation, 
shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 March, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [142] 3
text_norm: 2 26th day march 2021 appointed day health (amendment) act 2021 (no 1 2021) far already operation shall come operation given official seal 25 march 2021 stephen donnelly minister health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 30th march 2021 142 3

title: (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 1 of 2021), in so far as it is not already in operation,
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This order appoints 26 March 2021 as the day on which all sections of the Health 
(Amendment) Act 2021 not already commenced in SI 113 of 2021 or SI 124 of 
2021 shall come into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [142]
